Produce for victory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A billboard in front of a truck illustrating a man and woman working in a garden with the words, "Produce for Victory."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Billboards; Trucks; Victory gardens; War work
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Roll 228-13; 4-15-1944; Billboard in Oak Ridge Area
